div.p: Diverse Paraphrasing and its Effectiveness in Data
Augmentation Ashutosh Kumar*, Satwik Bhattamishra*, Manik Bhandari, Partha Talukdar
Machine and Language Learning Lab (MALL) Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore
User: I want to book a flight from Minneapolis to New York
User: I want to book a flight from Minneapolis to New York
Bot: Sure. When are you planning to travel ?
User: I want to book a flight from Minneapolis to New York
Bot: Sure. When are you planning to travel ?
User: Can you book plane to New York from Minneapolis
User: I want to book a flight from Minneapolis to New York
Bot: Sure. When are you planning to travel ?
User: Can you book plane to New York from Minneapolis
Sorry, I dont understand what youre saying
Bot: Sorry, I dont understand what youre saying
User: I want to book a flight from Minneapolis to New York
Bot: Sure. When are you planning to travel ?

DiPS Find k diverse paraphrases with high fidelity
Method based on subset selection of candidate (sub)sequences
